I could reanimate it with Master Reanimation.Is members only: trueIs variant of: Ensouled dragon headUses infobox: ItemImage: File:Ensouled dragon head.pngWeight: 0.453Value: 650Version anchor: DropRelease date: 7 January 2016Item ID: 13510

An ensouled dragon head is an item which can be dropped by chromatic dragons. It is used to gain Prayer experience by using the level 90 Magic spell Master Reanimation from the Arceuus spellbook using 4 Soul runes, 2 Blood runes, and 4 Nature runes. When a player reanimates an ensouled dragon head, a reanimated dragon will appear and grant 1,560 Prayer experience after being killed.

Ensouled heads can be reanimated anywhere as long as the head is on the ground within the 31x31 area centred on its initial drop location and has not been put into the bank, trade screen, Grand Exchange, or price checker.[1][2] Otherwise, it must be taken to the Dark Altar in Arceuus to be reanimated.

Using a knife on Kbd heads will return three ensouled dragon heads.

Vorkath's head can be used in place of an ensouled dragon head for Master Reanimation.

Note: The dragon hunter lance does work on the Reanimated dragon[3].

Changes[edit | edit source]

Date Changes
30 March 2022
(update)

Ensouled heads can now drop in instanced areas.

28 April 2021
(update)

The examine text was slightly changed; previously, it was "The creature's soul is still in here."

References[edit | edit source]

  1. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 31 July 2020. (Archived from the original on 8 September 2021.) Mod Ash: "About 15 tiles from where the object was dropped."
  2. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 6 June 2020. (Archived from the original on 8 September 2021.) Mod Ash: "There are two versions of those heads. The version obtained from the dragon can be reanimated in the same area that it was dropped. It's untradeable. If you try to put it in the trade screen or GE, it transforms to a tradeable version that can only reanimate at the Dark Altar."
  3. ↑ Jagex. Mod Ash's Twitter account. 4 April 2019. (Archived from the original on 28 May 2020.) Mod Ash: "Should do, yes."

[[File:Ensouled dragon head detail.png|left|150px]]
An '''ensouled dragon head''' is an item which can be dropped by chromatic [[dragon (race)|dragons]]. It is used to gain [[Prayer]] experience by using the level 90 [[Magic]] spell [[Master Reanimation]] from the [[Arceuus spellbook]] using 4 [[Soul runes]], 2 [[Blood runes]], and 4 [[Nature runes]]. When a player reanimates an ensouled dragon head, a [[reanimated dragon]] will appear and grant 1,560 Prayer experience after being killed.

Ensouled heads can be reanimated anywhere as long as the head is on the ground within the 31x31 area centred on its initial drop location and has not been put into the [[bank]], [[trade]] screen, [[Grand Exchange]], or [[price checker]].{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1289279363532435461|date=31 July 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.is/OqtAp|archivedate=8 September 2021|quote=About 15 tiles from where the object was dropped.}}{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1269309943422877696|date=6 June 2020|archiveurl=https://archive.is/7NPVB|archivedate=8 September 2021|quote=There are two versions of those heads. The version obtained from the dragon can be reanimated in the same area that it was dropped. It's untradeable. If you try to put it in the trade screen or GE, it transforms to a tradeable version that can only reanimate at the Dark Altar.}} Otherwise, it must be taken to the [[Dark Altar]] in [[Arceuus]] to be reanimated.

Using a [[knife]] on [[Kbd heads]] will return three ensouled dragon heads.

[[Vorkath's head]] can be used in place of an ensouled dragon head for [[Master Reanimation]].

Note: The [[dragon hunter lance]] does work on the [[Reanimated dragon]]{{CiteTwitter|author=Mod Ash|url=https://twitter.com/JagexAsh/status/1113746244986388480|date=4 April 2019|archiveurl=https://archive.is/UqiFA|archivedate=28 May 2020|quote=Should do, yes.}}.
